TEXT: Play cards to gain #yPrinciples . NL NL You can raise your #yPrinciples to the same vale of the card, while some cards can directly increase the value of the #yPrinciples.  NL NL [#FF43F0]Secret Histories[] is a special principle, the more you have, the more #yloots you will get.
Consume #yPrinciples to enter #yMansus . NL NL You can get different cards from #yMansus ,like [#FF43F0]Secret Histories[] cards. NL NL When you #yrest at camp, #yMansus will be upgraded.
Consume #yPrinciples to perform #ySummonRites . NL NL Summoning needs [#9331D5]Knock[] and other two kinds of #yPrinciples related to the spirit.
